meanings.sent1: The ignorami in the village struggled to read and write.
meanings.sent2: The teacher patiently explained the lesson to the group of ignorami.
meanings.sent3: The ignorami were puzzled by the concept of advanced mathematics.
meanings.sent4: In a world of knowledge, the ignorami were lost in a sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ignorami fumbling with books stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of people who lack knowledge or awareness.
meanings.sent1: The ignorami at the meeting were unaware of the new policy.
meanings.sent2: The team of ignorami needed guidance to understand the task.
meanings.sent3: The ignorami were surprised by the sudden change in weather.
meanings.sent4: In a room full of experts, the ignorami felt out of place.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ignorami looking lost in the discussion stayed with me.

meanings.definition: Individuals who are uninformed or unaware.
meanings.sent1: The ignorami in the group were clueless about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent2: The community outreach program aimed to educate the ignorami.
meanings.sent3: The ignorami were completely oblivious to the latest news.
meanings.sent4: In a world of secrets, the ignorami were left in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ignorami missing out on important information haunted me.
